bio.short: Founder & CEO - Software engineering leader tired of managing infrastructure.
bio.long: Founder & CEO - Software engineering leader tired of managing infrastructure.  Enjoys building cohesive development teams, distributed systems and elegant developer tooling.

bio.short: Full Stack JavaScript Developer and ramen enthusiast
bio.long: David is a Full Stack JavaScript Developer, entrepreneur, past life marketer. Developer @ http://serverless.com

bio.short: Head of Operations and Mysore yoga addict
bio.long: Serverless Operations Manager Casey Shultz is a yoga loving, dog cuddling, San Francisco transplant originally from Alaska. When she's not ruling the Serverless office with an iron fist you can find her camping in Yosemite.

bio.short: Head of Growth and global man of mystery
bio.long: Nick is passionate about understanding and solving complex problems for software development teams. Prior to joining Serverless he was in charge of scaling growth at CircleCI and helped to design and build early versions of CircleCI Enterprise.

bio.short: Framework Core Developer and resident Jean Claude van Damme
bio.long: Philipp Müns is a core developer at Serverless, Inc. He works on the team in charge of building and maintaining the Serverless Framework — an application framework for building web, mobile and IoT applications powered by AWS Lambda, Azure Functions, Google Cloud Functions and more

bio.short: Framework Core Developer on the other side of the planet
bio.long: Eslam is a Senior Developer at Serverless. He's leading the team in charge of building and maintaining the Serverless Framework since its inception in 2015. Before Serverless, he served in engineering roles in startups all over the world, most recently at YellowPay, a Bitcoin payment gateway based in Dubai. Eslam's experience is on the full stack with a focus on the backend. He's passionate about open source, dev tools and Bitcoin. He's been coding since 2006, and studied Computer Engineering at the Arab Academy for Science & Technology. Eslam is currently settled in Bangkok, Thailand while traveling around the world every couple of months.

bio.short: Platform Backend Engineer and proud new father
bio.long: Maciej Winnicki is a passionate software engineer focused on building distributed systems, designing easy-to-use APIs and creating tools for making developer's life easier. He has been working for different-sized companies, from a SV startup to the largest e-commerce site in Eastern Europe. These days you can find him actively contributing to and maintaining the open source projects.

bio.short: Technology Evangelist who loves to code, mentor and share the knowledge.
bio.long: Rupak Ganguly is a technologist with an eye for simple design, big picture, clear goals and strong foundations rooted in diversity.

bio.short: Technology entrepreneur, product manager, software architect.
bio.long: I firmly believe I must have passion for what I do. It keeps me energized and inspires me to give everything I have to give. I believe in doing whatever I can to enrich the lives of those around me and that I have much to learn from anyone I may interact with. I have been lucky to be surrounded by great people, all of which have had a measurable impact on my life.

bio.short: Type-theory esotericist who knows kung fu
bio.long: From the Florida Gulf Coast to San Francisco, I’ve crossed the continent to help envision and implement the future of the serverless paradigm.
